Name: Flipping Good
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sour or Martini/Coupette glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Simply an aged rum flip with falernum replacing sugar syrup and egg white omitted.
History: Created in December 2008 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
